pr_title: Make sure all Arc build items have at least some javadoc

timeline.bodyText: AFAIK Allows to add... is not gramatically correct. A direct object is needed. E.g. Allows users to.... I prefer "Makes it possible to" ;-). Moreover, I'd avoid using "CDI components". It's a more general tool and it could be used for non-CDI classes as well.
timeline.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText:
not gramatically correct

You got me there, I'll fix that.

could be used for non-CDI classes as well.

I thought about writing it more generally...but we cannot be sure that if you use it outside of CDI components, it will be taken into account, right? Only extensions that operate with AnnotationStore will see the changes :-/
replies.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText:
Only extensions that operate with AnnotationStore will see the changes :-/

Yes, and ideally all extensions that read annotations should use the AnnotationStore. I know it's a utopia and the API is not ready for this kind of usage but still I'd like to keep it as general as possible ;-).
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.message: Make sure all Arc build items have at least some javadoc.

timeline.author: mkouba
mkouba

timeline.message: Make sure all Arc build items have at least some javadoc.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Makes it possible to add, remove or alter annotations on various components.
          
          
            
             * Make it possible to add, remove or alter annotations on various components.
          
      
    
    
  

is generally better.
timeline.author: gsmet

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/AnnotationsTransformerBuildItem.java b/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/AnnotationsTransformerBuildItem.java
index 44256ed0fa..e4d803349d 100644
--- a/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/AnnotationsTransformerBuildItem.java
+++ b/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/AnnotationsTransformerBuildItem.java

@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ import io.quarkus.arc.processor.AnnotationsTransformer;
 import io.quarkus.builder.item.MultiBuildItem;
 
 /**
- * Makes it possible to add, remove or alter annotations on various components.
+ * Make it possible to add, remove or alter annotations on various components.
  * The provided transformer uses {@link AnnotationsTransformer#appliesTo(AnnotationTarget.Kind)} to limit the scope
  * of transformer to classes, fields, methods, method params or a combination of those.
  *

timeline.bodyText: I think we should add some information about when it makes sense to use that one instead of CombinedIndexBuildItem.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -8,6 +8,17 @@
 
 import io.quarkus.builder.item.SimpleBuildItem;
 
+/**
+ * Represent a Jandex {@link IndexView} on the whole deployment that has a complete CDI-related information.
+ *
+ * Compared to {@link io.quarkus.deployment.builditem.CombinedIndexBuildItem} this index can contain additional classes
+ * that were indexed while bean discovery was in progress.
+ *
+ * It also holds information about all programmatically registered beans and all generated bean classes.

replies.bodyText: Basically you should use this for anything CDI-related. I will add here something along those lines.
replies.author: manovotn

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanArchiveIndexBuildItem.java b/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanArchiveIndexBuildItem.java
index 72a13aed20..8b742ad5a7 100644
--- a/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanArchiveIndexBuildItem.java
+++ b/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanArchiveIndexBuildItem.java

@@ -10,6 +10,7 @@ import io.quarkus.builder.item.SimpleBuildItem;
 
 /**
  * Represent a Jandex {@link IndexView} on the whole deployment that has a complete CDI-related information.
+ * As such, this index should be used for any CDI-oriented work.
  *
  * Compared to {@link io.quarkus.deployment.builditem.CombinedIndexBuildItem} this index can contain additional classes
  * that were indexed while bean discovery was in progress.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Build item that registers a listener which gets notified as soon as CDI bean container is initialized.
          
          
            
             * Build item that registers a listener which gets notified as soon as the CDI bean container is initialized.
timeline.author: gsmet

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanContainerListenerBuildItem.java b/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanContainerListenerBuildItem.java
index b96389a732..0910836cd7 100644
--- a/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanContainerListenerBuildItem.java
+++ b/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/BeanContainerListenerBuildItem.java

@@ -5,9 +5,9 @@ import io.quarkus.arc.runtime.BeanContainerListener;
 import io.quarkus.builder.item.MultiBuildItem;
 
 /**
- * Build item that registers a listener which gets notified as soon as CDI bean container is initialized.
+ * Build item that registers a listener which gets notified as soon as the CDI bean container is initialized.
  * This is a convenient way to get access to beans and configure them as soon as the container is started.
- * An instance of running {@link BeanContainer} is provided to the listener.
+ * An instance of the running {@link BeanContainer} is provided to the listener.
  *
  * @see BeanContainerListener
  */
